channel.title: Piece - a part of a file on Filecoin Spec
channel.description: Recent content in Piece - a part of a file on Filecoin Spec

item.title: PieceStore - storing and indexing pieces
item.description: A PieceStore is an object that can store and retrieve pieces from some local storage. The PieceStore additionally keeps an index of pieces. import ipld "github.com/filecoin-project/specs/libraries/ipld" type PieceID UVarint // PieceStore is an object that stores pieces into some local storage. // it is internally backed by an IpldStore. type PieceStore struct { Store ipld.Store Index {PieceID: Piece} Get(i PieceID) struct {p Piece, e error} Put(p Piece) error Delete(i PieceID) error }
